message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.AI 

This paper deals with automatic text classification using BERT, which is a popular language model in natural language processing (NLP). Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also mentions large-scale statistical analysis, which suggests that it may fall under cs.IR (Information Retrieval). The proposed metric for evaluating the model's performance is human-centric, which could be relevant to cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also mentions pathology slide images, which suggests that it may fall under cs.CV (Computer Vision). Finally, the use of BERT for text classification is a common technique in cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence).
